realize that they do face new increased risks from natural disaster. The New York Times contrasts the recent Australian floods with the Brazilian floods. Many fewer people died in the Australian Floods. Why? "The hillside areas around Rio lacked early warning systems or effective community organizations that might have helped residents to wake one another as the rains intensified last Tuesday night, disaster experts and residents said. Most people are believed to have died early Wednesday morning as they slept, when water-loosened earth swept their houses away." Eric Schmidt 's departure had been a long time coming, says Charles Arthur in The Guardian: After slipups with search, Street View and Android, it's clear that Google needs tighter control at the top- and Eric Schmidt is not the man for the job. What of Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin ? He is said to be focusing on strategic projects and is particularly interested in social networking.
